channel.title: Gravedigging
channel.description:
Is it just me? Or is gravedigging at an all fucking time high?...... I mean, the rate just seemed to me as if it went up, especially by this [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=363640]fag[/url]. HE OUTFUCKING TROLLS ME SO MUCH, BUT I DONT GRAVEDIG!
bottom line, staff needs to step up on gravedigging enforcement, because it seems its been exploding lately.. What do you guys think?

item.title: Gravedigging
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:28, topic:398575”]As stated it depends if the gravedig contributes to the topic, if it doesn’t then the user may be infracted (Based on the moderators view on the situation). I’ve not really seen huge amounts of grave digging? If you see any grave digging then just report it.

It’s also exam week for me, and possibly some others so that might explain a little.

Three reasons why I now disrespect you.
Calling people “fags” in threads and complaining about them is just not very mature at all.

Because Mature People LOVE to hang out on a site filled with Ripped off versions of an MMORPG.

It’s possible.[/quote]
well, it could just be me, but lately, it seems to me that gravedigging has been increased, and my question is if mods even consider that rule breaking anymore, because i never see a topic getting locked for gravedigging.

Read full topic

item.title: Gravedigging
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Once again, the report button was installed into SMF software for a reason, feel free to use it mate. Let’s be honest, whether we take higher punishment against grave-diggers, the chances of them stopping at the cost of being banned are slim. Nonetheless, the best thing the moderators can do is infract them or something, whether the members stop doing such childish things is up to them. Because some of the moderators are having some in real life problems I presume, don’t expect so much infractions to be handed out for the time being.

We have two moderators that I’ve seen or at least shown their doing something, as far as I can tell, the rest of them are doing in real life sort outs.

Read full topic

[/quote]>implying that this site contains no mature people.[/quote]
there is only about 5 mature people, 1 of which being MITB.

rant:

it isnt like gravedigging is a big deal or anything -.- just ignore it or join in, unless the topic is completely useless. The irl pics topic is a complete example of an important board dug up constantly by people wanting to show their pictures to this online audience.

Yeah, but thats different, it has a purpose, and its not posted on every 120 days…[quote=“I Vain I”]why do you complain about gravedigging
its fun[/quote]
Honestly, if someone gravedigs only once, twice, or three times, its okay, i really don’t care… but some people do it alot, to topics it just doesnt even make sense to gravedig…[quote=“Classic_, post:22, topic:398575”]No need for this topic, we already know.[/quote]
But it seems like no extra precautions/actions are being taken against this…

Read full topic

item.title: Gravedigging
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

The moderators take grave-digging not as serious depending on the post, please take account for that the moderators do what they can with the forums. From what I’ve been told by some of the moderators, the posts must be and remain on the thread topic in order for it to not be held against regulations. If you feel the post is not on thread topic, feel free to report the post and leave it at that. Telling the moderators their not doing a nice job with running the forum, or at least giving out the idea isn’t going to help at all.

I never said they are doing a bad job… im just saying it looks to me as if they are neglecting that rule or not taking action against it as they used too…
And yes, im talking about 9 month gravedigs or so, which happen alot, im not talking about a week gravedig…
Its probably just me, but are the mods giving equal attention to all sections? I mean… i understand some receive more traffic than others, but still, all sections have rule breakers.

Why point someone out.

This topic is worse then him gravedigging.

Report and move on.

  1. Because he never stops the gravedigging, no matter what people tell him, he decides he needs to help people who probably have left the forum 5 months ago, or don’t need help on the said matter anymore, because of the fact that someone probably already helped the person, etc.

  2. Im only pointing it out, don’t like the topic? Then leave.

  3. How far would that go? Yes, i did report that guy, but what stops him or someone else in general who got a punishment from changing their ip and making a new account and repeating the same offense again and again? And people do that… not on this forum in specific, but everywere, just to annoy people or cause mischief.

Read full topic
